item.title: Litter all along Nelson Mandela road, 25th January
item.description:
Litter all along the road on the pavement and verges. RBG are consistently failing to maintain a basic service by clearing litter according to the agreed weekly schedule. It hasn’t been cleared for weeks. Complaint submitted to RBG
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nelson Mandela Road, Kidbrooke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: From the Cockfosters Road end of Heddon court avenue to around house number 12 the whole road needs resurfacing. Continual potholes. Road heavily used due to drs surgery supermarket nearby etc, 25th January
item.description:
Problem is ongoing. Has been there for many months random pothole are repaired eventually and then others appear immediately. Futile just filling in the pit holes; this whole big of road needs resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heddon Court Avenue, Cockfosters, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Motorbike chain on base of internet pole, 25th January
item.description:
Outside 36/34 Aylesbury Road around base of communication pole on the pavement there is a thick motorbike chain that has been there for years. It was not removed during the recent pavement upgrade.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Aylesbury Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked road gulley. I've reported this for 10 years now., 25th January
item.description:
Hello. There is a curb gully at the end of valley road, by the electric car chargers that i have been reporting for the past 10 years now. Major blockage. Road floods. People now standing in huge amounts of surface water plugging in their electric cars. Does no one at LBB see the health and safety issue here??? It's about time this was addressed, fixed and put right before homes get flooded or someone is killed at an electric charging point swamped in water. I will continue to report it regularly as i have been since i moved into the road in 2012.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valley Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Southbury Road, Southbury, Greater London
